title.newValue: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Cloud attachments support for Viva Engage / Yammer messages

description.newValue:
,Previously, cloud attachments worked only for links and link attachments shared in Outlook and Microsoft Teams. Now, cloud attachments will also work with Yammer/Viva Engage user and community messages.
GA date: May CY2023
Preview date: April CY2023
